function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding of vectors and their behavior leading to ineffective control measures.","Impact":"Increased propagation of contagious diseases and potential outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Train and retain entomologists to improve understanding of vectors and control methods.","Technologies":"Entomological research and training programs.","People":"Public at risk of vector-borne diseases.","Owner":"Health organizations, governments, and research institutions."},{"Description":"Lack of cross-border collaboration leading to uncoordinated efforts in disease control.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases across borders.","Mitigation":"Encourage and facilitate cross-border collaboration and regional efforts in disease control.","Technologies":"Communication and coordination technologies, international partnerships.","People":"Communities in border regions at risk of disease transmission.","Owner":"Government agencies, international health organizations."},{"Description":"Limited vector control methods leading to ineffective disease control.","Impact":"Increased prevalence of vector-borne diseases and resistance to single control tools.","Mitigation":"Expand vector control toolbox and involve sectors outside health in environmental management.","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring and management tools, larval control methods.","People":"Communities at risk of vector-borne diseases.","Owner":"Health and environmental agencies, local governments."},{"Description":"Reliance on single vector control tools leading to unsustainable disease control measures.","Impact":"Ineffective disease control and potential outbreaks due to resistance to single control tools.","Mitigation":"Promote combined and sustainable vector control methods including vaccines, MDA, and diagnosis and treatment.","Technologies":"Vaccine development, mass drug administration, diagnostic tools.","People":"Public at risk of vector-borne diseases.","Owner":"Health organizations, governments, and research institutions."}]}
